Deficiency Narrative: Two out of two files were missing the screening form required by minimum standards.
Correction Narrative: Staff confirmed all files were an audited and items were put inside staff files that were missing. Staff also confirmed higher staff position members audited the staff to ensure all required documentation were available. Operation will conduct monthly audits by staff to ensure all required documentation is not missing on all new hires.

Deficiency Narrative: There was no written documentation indicating that a debriefing was conducted with the child following the restraint, or any written documentation stating that the child continued to be in an emergency following the restraint, which could have justified the lack of a completed debriefing.
Correction Narrative:
Received a corrective action plan from the owner of the operation stating that they updated their existing Serious Incident Report and Restraint Documentation Forms to include the following: 
        Pre-incident debriefing section (if time permits before physical intervention).
        Post-incident debriefing for staff including what went well, what could have been improved, emotional impact, and follow-up actions.
        Post-incident debriefing for youth including emotional regulation support, trauma response, youth reflection, and re-establishment of safety.
